name: Discrete-Time Smoothing
abstraction: Kalman filtering results are applied to yield alternative computationally stable fixed-lag smoothing algorithms including reduced order and minimal order fixed-lag smoothers. The reduced order smoothing algorithms are new and clearly have advantages over the more familiar algorithms.
